content: mystery mini skein advent mini shawl knit-a-long this pattern will be updated daily with x 25 daily colour work charts starting on 1st december 2024 the finished triangular mini shawl will measure approximately 130cm long by 32cm wide at its widest point and will be knitted using colourwork techniques this pattern requires - 24 x 10g merino blend sock yarn mini skeins 1 per day 10g = 42 5m 22 x solid colours & 2 x variegated mini skeins totalling 1 020m yarn - 100g/425m cream/undyed sock yarn - 3mm knitting needles i recommend using cabled needles as the maximum width of the scarf will be 32cm approx this pattern was designed to accompany the folkestone harbour yarn 2024 naturally dyed advent calendar it will work with other mini skein sets or using sock yarns from your stash but the intended colour for each daily section will be available only in the fhy 2024 naturally dyed advent calendar techniques used for the pattern will be stocking/stockinette stitch 2 colour and some 3 colour colourwork reading from a colourwork chart simple increases & decreases i-cord edge
